devdoc.details: Simulates a DeFi protocol (like Aave or Lido) where the principal is deposited to earn yield. For demo purposes, the yield amount is manually set by the deployer or the contract owner when settling the pool.

authorizePool(address).details: Authorize a pool contract to call yield functions

depositPrincipal(address,uint256).details: Simulates the action of sending the pool's principal to a DeFi protocol.

params._poolAddress: The address of the betting pool contract.

returnPrincipalAndYield(address,uint256).details: Returns the total funds (Principal + Yield) back to the Pool for distribution.

params._poolAddress: The address of the betting pool contract.
params._totalAmount: The total principal + yield to be returned.

setPoolYield(address,uint256).details: Sets the simulated yield generated by the principal (called by the owner or pool).

devdoc.title: MockYieldProvider
